title: The Entertainer Blogger Award 🥇
content:
Hi Everyone, I'm so happy and honored because my blog has been nominated to "The Entertainer Blogger Award" and this nomination is for being a blogger who is fun, inspiring and entertaining. I heartfully thank you Nisha for nominating me, actually I surprised last year and this year you're the person who recognized my blog and nominated I always thank you for making me a part of this award nominee. You can check her blog https://inspiresn.wordpress.com/ with different categories they are recipes, inspiration and photography, all recipes 🍛 are well explained and those quotes are really inspiration 👌coming to last category beautiful and amazing photography 🦋 Don't miss out the beautiful blog..( checkout ☺️ ) Rules:
  • Thank the person who nominated you add link to their blog
  • Add the rules, so others can follow
  • Nominate people who you find fun, inspiring and entertaining!
  • Answer the same questions
  • Include the graphic in your post
Why did you start blogging in the first place? I love to cook and serve food with love.. like to experiment on food 😋 Don't worry 😉 the recipes I shared are not my experiments they're lovely you can tryout.. One day suddenly I decided and started blogging What is your favourite book? Frankly saying, I don't have a habit of reading books 🙇‍♀️ What do you dislike the most? People who irritates and annoying repeatedly 😒 What is your favorite food at the mall? Vegetable Pot Biryani/ Chaats / Ice Cream 🍨 What is your favorite pastime? They are many but I share one of them..I enjoyed my dreamland Disneyland and castle..mind blowing rides 😍 My Nominees are:
